name: Land of chaos
description:
introduction to the game:


"Land of chaos" is an rpg+ lightweight rogue like Diablo independent game. The "adventurer" should guard the last fortress in the place of chaos to avoid being eroded by corruption, enter the abyss of chaos, go to the deepest place of chaos, find the source of corruption, and solve the problem of corruption diffusion

game features:


1. No professional distinction, learning talent to form a unique school
2. Skills are collocated at will, and there is no fixed choice
3. Explore the randomly generated Adventure Map
4. Surprise with random affixes
5. Round system battle form with a little strategy

developer's words:


Lu: "land of chaos" was learned and developed because the author wanted to make an interesting brush music game. At present, it is still in the process of learning, and it is still insufficient in all aspects. I also apologize for this.
The current online version does not represent the final product. There are still many bugs in the game, but the author will continue to update it to achieve the best effect
